column4: But I dont want to have spent $20 on WoW with $50 worth of playing cards, and a $100 webcam, and not have either work
For the last time Im not using my pc for WoW!
Thats far from "All that I use my PC for"
Well, my main question, is after you get a tar.gz file how do you run it? I know you have to extract it, but then what? I try runnung the makefile and nothing happens
I didnt say Linux sucks, I said its dificult
don't categorize people by a stupid term
have you checked the restricted drivers?
Usually nVidia drivers appear they by default if your card is detected
If you want additional settings for your card, sudo apt-get install nvidia-settings
Although your card may not support it
